name: df-rlim
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(crli, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(cc, cpm, cr)), wcel(cv(s1), cc)), wral(s2, crp, wrex(s3, cr, wral(s4, cdm(cv(s0)), wi(wbr(cv(s3), cle, cv(s4)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4)), cmin, cv(s1))), clt, cv(s2)))))))))
comment: Define the limit relation for partial functions on the reals. See ~ rlim for its relational expression. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2014.)
